title: Add Discover page with IGDB Popularity API
description:
Add a new Discover page that displays popular games from IGDB using their Popularity API.

## Features
- Dropdown to select popularity type (all 8 types: Visits, Want to Play, Playing, Played, 24hr Peak, Reviews)
- Grid of game cards showing popular games
- 'In Library' badge on games already in user's library
- Add to Library button on each card

## Implementation
1. Add types to src/server/integrations/igdb/types.ts
2. Add getPopularityTypes() and getPopularGames() to IGDBClient
3. Create src/server/routes/discover.ts
4. Register route in index.ts
5. Add API methods to frontend client
6. Create src/web/src/pages/Discover.tsx
7. Add routing and nav link in App.tsx
close_reason: Closed
